architectural_notes: Work exclusively from version 151 as the baseline; do not carry over any changes from versions 152â€“170.
Fix scope constraint: only make minimal code changes required to restore admin form submission; no refactor/redesign/layout/style/file-structure changes.
Integrate admin form submission with the existing backend without changing the backend structure/API contract.
known_issues: Admin page form submission currently reports it is not connected to the backend; needs repair while keeping backend structure unchanged (baseline v151).

existing_features.title:
Fix the admin-page form submission error that says the form is not connected to the backend by ensuring the frontend actor initialization does not fail when calling the existing backend access-control initialization method.

Specifically, update the actor creation flow so that if `initializeAccessControl()` (or `_initializeAccessControlWithSecret(...)` when present) throws because access control is already initialized, the error is handled and the actor is still returned/usable. Do not change any backend code or backend interface/structure.
